00026 /* Deal with an ICC annoyance.  It tries hard to pretend to be GCC<
00027    but doesn't understand its attributes properly. */
00028 #ifdef __ICC
00029 # define __gcc_attribute__(x)
00030 #else
00031 # define __gcc_attribute__ __attribute__
00032 #endif
